Title: Permits students to be admitted to certain colleges and be eligible for certain financial aid if they received a high school diploma, or the equivalent thereof, from certain online high schools
Summary: Permits college students to be able to be admitted to certain colleges and be eligible for certain financial aid if they received a high school diploma, or the equivalent thereof, from certain online high school programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to permitting college students to be able to be admitted to certain colleges and be eligible for certain financial aid if they received a high school diploma, or the equivalent thereof, from certain online high school programs
